error.minChars: Text must be at least 250 characters long
error.apiError: An error occurred while checking the text. Please try again.

whyToScan.title: Why it's vital to use a virus scanner
whyToScan.description: Scan first, ask questions later. Spot viruses before they infiltrate your devices.

virusesHatePrivacy.title: Viruses hate your privacy
virusesHatePrivacy.description: A potent virus can steal sensitive information like your credentials or passwords, encrypt and lock you out of your data, make individual transactions within apps, monitor your computer, and even attack other devices on connected networks. A virus has the potential to access nearly everything that is locked away on your hardware.

stopMalware.title: Stop malware before it stops you
stopMalware.description: Once a virus has propagated, it can infect all your programs and applications without prejudice. Its destructive code can and likely will spread everywhere. That is why it is crucial to utilize virus scanner.

freeOnlineScanner.title: A free online virus scanner you can trust
freeOnlineScanner.description: Safeguard your privacy with our free virus scanner, designed to help you avoid infection and protect your computer.

scanFiles.title: Scan files for viruses in complete confidence
scanFiles.description: Internxt has and will always put users' privacy and security first. We are committed to creating a more fair, more free, and more transparent internet for all. That's why we created our free online virus scanner, to shine a light on stealthy viruses and expose malicious malware.

FeaturesSection.aiCheckerDescription:
Scan for ChatGPT or other AI-generated content with our free AI checker for up to X amount of words. Paste your content or upload it to get instant results, so you can make edits before publishing or submitting your content.

We don't store any content you submit to our AI detection tool. It simply scans for AI-generated patterns without storing any of the content you submit. With our ZeroGPT tool, we keep your content safe and private from AI tools that use data to train their own AI machine learning models.
FeaturesSection.aiDetectorTitle: ZeroGPT AI detector for ChatGPT, Gemini, CoPilot, and others
FeaturesSection.aiDetectorDescription:
Internxt ZeroGPT tool accurately and quickly scans for content generated by popular AI tools, such as ChatGPT and Gemini, among others. Once scanned, it provides feedback and differentiation between human-generated and AI-generated text, giving you a detailed analysis of your writing.

Our advanced and free AI checker detects the latest AI models, such as GPT-4, with high accuracy. Please note that no AI checker is 100% accurate due to the development of AI language models, but we strive to offer you the highest-level feedback possible.

CtaSection.title: Check and detect AI text
CtaSection.description: Ensure your text has the human touch

CtaSection2.title: Don’t let AI write your story
CtaSection2.description: Scan for ChatGPT, Gemini, and other AI content

faq.question: How does Internxt’s ZeroGPT work?
answer: When you upload your content, the software analyzes patterns that are common in AI-generated content, such as vocabulary, structure, grammar, and the famous em dash. These learning models are trained to detect differences between AI and human writing.

faq.question: How accurate is ZeroGPT?
answer: Our advanced algorithms can detect AI-written content with a high level of success, but no AI detection tool can detect AI text with 100% accuracy.

faq.question: Can Internxt’s AI detection tool suggest improvements?
answer: No, it can only highlight AI-written content and display the amount of text that is likely written by a real person.

faq.question: Can ZeroGPT detect plagiarism?
answer: No, our free AI detection tool is designed to detect AI content only. Plagiarism checkers are a different service that we do not provide.

faq.question: Why choose Internxt ZeroGPT over other AI detection tools
answer: Internxt’s free AI detection tool allows you to scan content that isn’t stored or shared with other companies, nor is it used to train AI language models, making it a valuable resource for checking for AI without compromising your privacy.

ToolsSection.title: Try out Internxt's free online security tools:

FeaturesSliderImg.title: Internxt ZeroGPT AI checker for everyday, education, or work use
FeaturesSliderImg.description: Whatever your needs, our AI detection tool provides instant, highly accurate results, so you can quickly scan for AI patterns and modify your content as needed.

info.title: Students
description: Internxt’s free ZeroGPT AI checker is perfect for students who need to submit papers that adhere to their school or university’s guidelines. You can identify content that is created by ChatGPT or other models that you may need to source and verify.

info.title: Educators
description: More students rely on AI tools to help or write their assignments. With our AI checker tool, you can check the work of your students to ensure that they wrote the work by analyzing the content for AI-generated or refined text.

info.title: Journalists
description: To avoid the spread of misinformation from AI content, journalists must strive to deliver stories that are authentic, factual, and trustworthy. AI detectors help maintain a media company's reputation by providing news from a reliable source, and not a robot.

info.title: Bloggers
description: Our ZeroGPT AI checker helps you create high-quality, unique content that engages your audience, drives traffic to your website, and helps you avoid search engine penalties. You can also verify the content of external publishers before publishing it on your website.

FeaturesSlider.title: Why use Internxt ZeroGPT AI Checker
FeaturesSlider.description: You can use our ZeroGPT AI checker with total confidence that your content is kept private and for quick, reliable results to publish or submit the best possible version of your work.

info.title: Advanced algorithms
description: Our AI detection tool uses advanced algorithms that look for common patterns used by ChatGPT, Gemini, and other tools to find AI-written content. When you upload or copy your content, the algorithms can distinguish between human-written and AI-generated content.

info.title: Unlimited checks
description: Perform an unlimited amount of AI checks for free whenever you need. We don’t hide this service behind paywalls; we offer a secure, private AI detection tool that is freely available whenever you need to authenticate your own work or that of others.

info.title: Guaranteed privacy
description: Everything you submit in our ZeroGPT tool remains confidential and private. Nothing you copy in the service is stored, shared, or used to train AI language models. Rest easy knowing your content is safe.

info.title: Multilingual support
description: We support multiple languages to help you review and analyze content with high accuracy. This makes it easy to detect and modify AI content, regardless of the language, for a consistent and reliable AI checker.

info.title: Instant feedback
description: Upload, or copy and paste your text into our tool, and we will instantly scan the content for AI content. This process happens in just a few seconds, and once it’s complete, you will get feedback on the text and whether AI-generated text has been found.

info.title: No signup required
description: Our AI detector is 100% free, and there are no limits on how often you use it. There’s no need for account creation or premium subscriptions, just add or upload the content you need to analyze, and that’s it!
